Text.Page:
Someone observed that these nexuses only appear in argon territory, which suggests a direct link. We've also spotted a strange device in the hands of some argons.

The mission is to scour {@Rgn:49001}, {@Rgn:50001}, and the {@Rgn:48001}, kill argons, and collect these devices for study.

Return safely. We need all the help we can get.
Excellent work. We'll begin our studies at once.
We must have those devices. It may prove the key to stopping these nexuses.
